actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-723.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3051, a bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3051 (John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3051, a bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
